On Sun, 2004-08-01 at 01:26, stack wrote:
> We've loosened the format -- see 6.4.1.3.2. user-agent in the user 
> manual (http://crawler.archive.org/articles/user_manual.html#settings)
> -- at yours and others suggestion.  We've also added an example to the 
> popup help of what a valid user-agent should look like (The error 
> message could still do with some work).

Thank you, that is a lot clearer in the manual at least.

-Lars
